fields.name: BaseUrl
fields.description: The base URI for this API collection. All endpoints of this API collection extend this base URI.

fields.name: DiscoveredVia
fields.description: The resource Id of the resource from where this API collection was discovered.

fields.name: DisplayName
fields.description: The display name of the API collection.

fields.name: NumberOfApiEndpoints
fields.description: The number of API endpoints discovered in this API collection.

fields.name: NumberOfApiEndpointsWithSensitiveDataExposed
fields.description: The number of API endpoints in this API collection which are exposing sensitive data in their requests and/or responses.

fields.name: NumberOfExternalApiEndpoints
fields.description: The number of API endpoints in this API collection for which API traffic from the internet was observed.

fields.name: NumberOfInactiveApiEndpoints
fields.description: The number of API endpoints in this API collection that have not received any API traffic in the last 30 days.

fields.name: NumberOfUnauthenticatedApiEndpoints
fields.description: The number of API endpoints in this API collection that are unauthenticated.

fields.name: ProvisioningState
fields.description: Gets the provisioning state of the API collection.

fields.name: SensitivityLabel
fields.description: The highest priority sensitivity label from Microsoft Purview in this API collection.
